column5: Gizmo and I woke up to a great snow fall this morning. He was even barking,saying,WHAT THE HELL IS THIS.LOL He loves it, as you can tell. Dont think he likes it though,when he lifts his leg and well,it,s still in the snow.LOL  Come on up Raulpie and play.  <iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/h0YxW7M7PNU?feature=player_detailpage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
